name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Tasklify — To Do, Tasks, Task lists

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Super productive To Do, Tasks, Task lists 🚀

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tasklify - Super Productive To Do, Tasks, Task lists 🚀

Increase your efficiency with our powerful task list management extension! Create tasks truly quickly and easily right in your browser 💪

Key features:
✅ Create, edit and delete tasks

💻 Add description, date, time and priority

📁 Create handy lists and rename as needed

🔄 Conveniently move tasks with drag-and-drop, arrange them as you like

➕ Create tasks right in your browser. Just click on the app icon and add a task without leaving the current tab

🟢🔴🟡 Prioritize tasks based on their importance

🖼️ Open Tasklify in a convenient popup window

✏️ Easily edit tasks

🗑️ Delete unnecessary tasks

✔️ Mark completed tasks without deleting them from the list

🧹 Clear all or only completed tasks

🌍 Multilingual interface with manual language selection. The following languages are supported: 🇺🇲English, 🇪🇸Español, 🇷🇺Русский, 🇵🇹Português, 🇩🇪Deutsch, 🇮🇹Italiano, 🇫🇷 Français

💾 Automatically save tasks in Chrome

👀 Compact display of descriptions with full text viewing option

📏 Optimized display of task names to maximize use of limited space

🔢 Task counter on the extension icon

👨‍🎨 Intuitive and user-friendly interface


Ideal for daily use. Organize your life, increase your productivity and achieve your goals with intuitive Tasklify! 🎯✨
